channel.title: Infinity Blade
channel.description:
Infinity Blade is the game, that is based on the free technology demo "Epic Citadel", that was released some months ago.
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JDvPIhCd8N4']Trailer[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qybdVPYeqr4']Gameplay[/url]
Well, making a whole thread for an iPhone and iPad app might be wrong, but Im just impressed of the possibilities these little devices have. And of course by the graphics.
Maybe there is somebody here who already bought it, and can tell us, how it is. I will buy it, when it's cheaper. Paying 5 € for it, is a bit too much, at the moment.
I guess, it only works on iPod touch 3G, iphone 3+ and iPad. Like Epic Citadel did.

item.title: Infinity Blade
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
It’s true that in that way it’s a bit repetitive. But the fighting itself and the leveling system are damn good. It hasn’t bored me yet and I’m at my 5th bloodline now.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinity Blade
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
I’ve read several bad reviews about it. That there is no real “Exploring” in the world. You can’t move on your own, the battles aren’t very tactical, and after 15 minutes you’ve seen everything and everything just starts from the beginning, until you’re that strong to beat the last enemy.

Good that I haven’t bought it yet, i’m only gonna get it, when there’s a price off, it isn’t worth 5 € in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinity Blade

item.description:
GAH, i hope i get the new iPod Touch 4 for christmas, i’m so gonna get this

item.description:
If I get an iPod Touch this Christmas, it’ll definitely be one of the first things I buy for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinity Blade
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
I really want this actually, but got no money

It got a 9 on IGN, though of course IGN isn’t something I’d always put my money on.
It also has a 4,5 star rating in the Itunes store.

I played Epic Citadel, and it’s so gorgeous that it’s nearly enough for me to purchase it alone. But the concept of the game itself also seems promising.

Read full topic

item.title: Infinity Blade
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
Infinity Blade is the game, that is based on the free technology demo “Epic Citadel”, that was released some months ago.

Trailer

Gameplay

Well, making a whole thread for an iPhone and iPad app might be wrong, but Im just impressed of the possibilities these little devices have. And of course by the graphics.

Maybe there is somebody here who already bought it, and can tell us, how it is. I will buy it, when it’s cheaper. Paying 5 € for it, is a bit too much, at the moment.

I guess, it only works on iPod touch 3G, iphone 3+ and iPad. Like Epic Citadel did.
